message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $10000 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $16000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I must respectfully decline at $16000. I would like to propose $12000 as a counteroffer.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $14000. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth it.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, considering my budget, I am unable to agree to $14000. I would like to propose $13000 as a counteroffer.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $14500. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I've been considering your proposals carefully. I would like to counteroffer at $14000.
